episodes.title: AA and Cult Prayer
episodes.description:
This week I'm going to be addressing a common assertion that I hear in AA, that PRAYER WORKS. But, if you pray in AA and it does not work out for you, or if you do not quit drinking, then they will tell you that you were not praying hard enough, praying the right prayer, or some little mechanism in the whole cult thing that is all your fault. 

Link to the study :

https://www.latimes.com/archives/la-xpm-2006-mar-31-sci-prayer31-story.html
